title: Canada set to pay billions to Indigenous children removed from their families, court rules
content:
1. Canada set to pay billions to Indigenous children removed from their families, court rules  CNN
  2. Global National: Sept. 30, 2021| Where is Canada's PM on National Day of Truth and Reconciliation?  Global News
  3. CP Supports 'Orange Shirt Day' With 'Every Child Matters' Locomotive  RailwayAge Magazine
  4. On Truth and Reconciliation Day, we must address how Canada and the Catholic Church worked to destroy Indigenous peoples  Toronto Star
  5. Wayne K. Spear: The National Day for Truth and Reconciliation will help ensure Canadians never forget the past  National Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: カナダは家族から引き離された先住民の子供たちに数十億ドルを支払う必要があると裁判所が判断
法院裁定，加拿大将向被带离家庭的土著儿童支付数十亿的费用
法院裁定，加拿大將向被帶離家庭的土著兒童支付數十億的費用
